RelatedSentence: Patrons visiting Klyde Warren Park have a new space to sit back and relax .
Patrons visiting Klyde Warren Park have a new space to sit back and relax .

The Southwest Porch , sponsored by Southwest Airlines , opened Monday and offers couches , chairs and wooden tables , along with free Wi - Fi , on Olive Street above the westbound lanes of Woodall Rodgers Freeway .

The airline created its first Southwest Porch in 2009 in Manhattan 's Bryant Park , extending the program to Denver , Atlanta and Dallas , which now has two ( the other is in Annette Strauss Square in the Arts District ) .

Kevin Krone , chief marketing officer for Southwest , used the opening of the porch to reveal new routes the company will begin offering in October with the lifting of flight restrictions at Love Field .
